title: database error
body:
upgrade from 5.0.13 to 6.0.0 came with this :(

{"app":"core","message":"failed to update database structure (exception 'pdoexception' with message 'sqlstate[23000]: integrity constraint violation: 19 primary key must be unique' in /www/owncloud/3rdparty/doctrine/dbal/lib/doctrine/dbal/connection.php:742
stack trace:
#0 [internal function]: pdo->query('insert into oc_...')
#1 /www/owncloud/3rdparty/doctrine/dbal/lib/doctrine/dbal/connection.php(742): call_user_func_array(array, array)
#2 /www/owncloud/lib/private/db/mdb2schemamanager.php(152): doctrine\dbal\connection->query('insert into oc_...')
#3 /www/owncloud/lib/private/db/mdb2schemamanager.php(91): oc\db\mdb2schemamanager->executeschemachange(object(doctrine\dbal\schema\schemadiff))
#4 /www/owncloud/lib/private/db.php(373): oc\db\mdb2schemamanager->updatedbfromstructure('/www/owncloud/a...')
#5 /www/owncloud/lib/private/app.php(965): oc_db::updatedbfromstructure('/www/owncloud/a...')
#6 /www/owncloud/lib/private/app.php(867): oc_app::updateapp('search_lucene')
#7 /www/owncloud/lib/private/app.php(92): oc_app::checkupgrade('search_lucene')
#8 /www/owncloud/lib/private/app.php(66): oc_app::loadapp('search_lucene')
#9 /www/owncloud/lib/private/updater.php(118): oc_app::loadapps()
#10 /www/owncloud/core/ajax/update.php(34): oc\updater->upgrade()
#11 {main}

next exception 'doctrine\dbal\dbalexception' with message 'an exception occurred while executing 'insert into oc_lucene_status (fileid, status) select fileid, status from __temp__oc_lucene_status':

sqlstate[23000]: integrity constraint violation: 19 primary key must be unique' in /www/owncloud/3rdparty/doctrine/dbal/lib/doctrine/dbal/dbalexception.php:47
stack trace:
#0 /www/owncloud/3rdparty/doctrine/dbal/lib/doctrine/dbal/connection.php(744): doctrine\dbal\dbalexception::driverexceptionduringquery(object(pdoexception), 'insert into oc_...')
#1 /www/owncloud/lib/private/db/mdb2schemamanager.php(152): doctrine\dbal\connection->query('insert into oc_...')
#2 /www/owncloud/lib/private/db/mdb2schemamanager.php(91): oc\db\mdb2schemamanager->executeschemachange(object(doctrine\dbal\schema\schemadiff))
#3 /www/owncloud/lib/private/db.php(373): oc\db\mdb2schemamanager->updatedbfromstructure('/www/owncloud/a...')
#4 /www/owncloud/lib/private/app.php(965): oc_db::updatedbfromstructure('/www/owncloud/a...')
#5 /www/owncloud/lib/private/app.php(867): oc_app::updateapp('search_lucene')
#6 /www/owncloud/lib/private/app.php(92): oc_app::checkupgrade('search_lucene')
#7 /www/owncloud/lib/private/app.php(66): oc_app::loadapp('search_lucene')
#8 /www/owncloud/lib/private/updater.php(118): oc_app::loadapps()
#9 /www/owncloud/core/ajax/update.php(34): oc\updater->upgrade()
#10 {main})","level":4,"time":"2013-12-12t15:33:36+08:00"}
{"app":"php","message":"failed to upgrade "search_lucene". at /www/owncloud/lib/private/app.php#873","level":3,"time":"2013-12-12t15:33:36+08:00"}
